markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Brain Drain](/Spells.aspx?ID=747)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Lore](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=7)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

</row>

</column>

---

You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge. This deals 1d8 mental damage with a basic Will save. If the target fails the save, you sort through the stolen memories to attempt a single check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26). Choose a skill that has the Recall Knowledge action, and use the target's skill modifier for the check.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The mental damage increases by 1d8.
name: Brain Drain

summary_markdown: You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge.
text: Brain Drain Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 230 2.0 Mystery Lore Cast Two Actions material, somatic Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw Will --- You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge. This deals 1d8 mental damage with a basic Will save. If the target fails the save, you sort through the stolen memories to attempt a single check to Recall Knowledge. Choose a skill that has the Recall Knowledge action, and use the target's skill modifier for the check. --- Heightened (+1) The mental damage increases by 1d8.
